welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.slide-1-description: Here, we make learning accessible and fun for everyone. Explore our content and begin your journey.
welcome.slide-2-description: This is your space to learn in an interactive and engaging way. Download the content and access it offline whenever you want!
welcome.slide-3-description: Join our community and discover a world of learning at your fingertips, regardless of your academic background.

login.no-match-2: The password fields must be the same
login.no-user: There is no user with this email address!
login.code-sent: We've sent a password reset code to your email address. Please enter it below.
login.many-attempts: Many attempts to resend! Please wait 5 minutes....

general.error-server: Erro de conexão com o servidor!
general.name: Name

course.name: Course name
course.welcome-description: Here you can find all the courses you are enrolled in!
course.no-courses-message: You haven't enrolled in any courses yet. Go to the Explore page and use the search to find courses of your interest.
course.fail: Failed to complete the course. Please try again later.
course.tooltip: This is your course page. This is where you will access the lessons and track your progress.

info-box.portability: Watch wherever and whenever you want!

lesson.video-error: Failed to fetch video URL. Please try again.

edu-screen.header: My name is Edu, and I'm here to help you navigate this app

welcome-page.description: You haven't signed up for any courses yet. Go to the Explore page and use the search to find courses that interest you.
welcome-page.tutorial-body: Here you will see all the courses you are enrolled in. To discover new courses, access

explore-drawer.tooltip: Here you will find all the information about the course, such as its duration. To begin, simply click on register now

profile.tooltip: You are on your profile page, where you can access your information, view certificates, and perform other activities.
profile.level_message: Only {{points}} pts. left for you to level up, keep studying to get there

explore-page.tutorial-body-first: On this page, you will find all available courses. Click on
explore-page.tutorial-body-second: To see the details and register.
